price: 97. Boye, bato ya bamboka bazali na elikya ete etumbu na biso ekoyela bango te na butu тре bango bazali kolala?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتٗا وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: afa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā bayātan wahum nāimūna
